feature1.explanation: Both texts use unconventional punctuation such as double quotation marks, hyphens, and brackets.

feature5.explanation: There are no apparent spelling or typographical errors in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the texts are likely written by the same author.
